subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Checks that instance variable names conform to a specified pattern.

tr.td: Controls whether to apply the check to public member.
Controls whether to apply the check to protected member.
Controls whether to apply the check to package-private member.
Controls whether to apply the check to private member.

subsection.name: Examples
subsection.p: An example of how to configure the check for names that begin with "m", followed by an upper case letter, and then letters and digits. Also, suppress the check from being applied to protected and package-private member:
subsection.source: <module name="Checker"> <module name="TreeWalker"> <module name="MemberName"> <property name="format" value="^m[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$"/> <property name="applyToProtected" value="false"/> <property name="applyToPackage" value="false"/> </module> </module> </module>
subsection.p: An example of how to suppress the check which is applied to public and private member:
subsection.source: <module name="Checker"> <module name="TreeWalker"> <module name="MemberName"> <property name="applyToPublic" value="false"/> <property name="applyToPrivate" value="false"/> </module> </module> </module>

subsection.name: Violation Messages
subsection.p: All messages can be customized if the default message doesn't suit you. Please see the documentation to learn how to.
